channel.title: CVE Feed for brianbrey -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for brianbrey -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8729|2024-10-10T13:11:58.678Z -- brianbrey -- easy%20social%20share%20buttons
item.description: The Easy Social Share Buttons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-8728|2024-10-01T15:33:00.291Z -- brianbrey -- easy%20load%20more
item.description: The Easy Load More plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
